Description: US Buyers: No taxes, duties or brokerage fees European and Japanese buyers: Taxes will be asked in the destination country. Please inquire at your local Customs Office before ordering as you will have to pay extra charges upon arrival of the parcel in your country Guitar comes with Custom Gibson Case. Case shows signs of wear but is in excellent working condition No COA. Overall condition: - Guitar is in very good to excellent condition - No breaks or structural repairs - Neck is straight and all electronics work as they should - Frets are in excellent plus condition - Small bumps, surface scratches over the body (front, back and sides) mostly invisible on the pictures - 2 bumps in the finish on the top also close to invisible on the pictures but they are there - No buckle rash - Light wear on the binding - Gold hardware shows some patina but has nicely aged Specifications: - Weight: 9 lbs 12 oz - Ebony fretboard - Gibson 490R & 498T Humbucker Pickups - Carved Maple Top - One piece Mahogany body - Mahogany Neck with Rounded 50's Neck Profile - Gold Hardware Some suggestions: Please note that some settings on this guitar like action, intonation, neck adjustment etc .....may need to be adjusted to your specific style of playing. Also once you have received the guitar you should leave the instrument in the case for at least 6 hours, so the instrument can acclimate to its new environment. Return and refund procedure: Item can be returned within 3 days of receipt. - Item arrived damaged or not as described: Full refund and seller pays for the return shipping costs - The customer didn't like the item (color, tone, neck size, weight etc....): Full refund less 10% restocking fee and buyer pays for the return shipping costs. - No partial refund. - Refund will be issued once the guitar is back in the sellers hand Carriers: - USPS for the United States - Canada Post for Canada
Title: 2009 Gibson Les Paul Custom Black Beauty with Gibson case
ConditionDescription: Very good condition, please read description
